scripts.build: mkdir -p build; cp package.json build; cd build; npm install --production; cd ..; docker build -t $npm_package_name:latest .
scripts.deploy-prod: `aws ecr get-login --no-include-email --region us-east-1`; docker tag $npm_package_name:latest 587133816005.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/${npm_package_name}:latest; docker push 587133816005.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/${npm_package_name}:latest; aws ecs update-service --cluster aptus --service $npm_package_name --task-definition $npm_package_name --desired-count 1 --force-new-deployment
scripts.deploy-test: `aws ecr get-login --no-include-email --region us-east-1`; docker tag $npm_package_name:latest 587133816005.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/${npm_package_name}:test; docker push 587133816005.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/${npm_package_name}:test; aws ecs update-service --cluster aptus-test --service $npm_package_name --task-definition ${npm_package_name}-test --desired-count 1 --force-new-deployment
